title: Eclipse 11 in. Stainless Steel Serving Spoon
description: Eclipse 11" Stainless Steel Serving Spoon, this all purpose tool is perfect for cooking and serving. Made from professional quality stainless steel making it very durable, hygienic and easy to clean, ergonomically designed for great control and comfort in use. Attractive design with hanging loop for convenient storage.Made of high quality stainless steelHas a hanging loop for easy storageStylish satin finishVery durable, hygienic and easy to clean
